name: FNAF PS1 Game
description:
WARNING): this game is not inspired on the FNAF VHS tapes, it's more of a PS1 style game with some VHS aspects

Visiting fazbear's, a FNAF fan game with low poly VHS/ PS1 like graphics, inspired in the "Puppet Combo" games. The game will have some lore lightly inspired on Fazbear's Frights Stichwraith stories.
